Posts.Content: Hi. I had wide local excision and SLN biopsy. SLN negative IDC grade 2;1.4 cm single tumour, ER+ve Told I didn't need chemo as low risk.  As I didn't have a mastectomy I'm having radiotherapy and tamoxifen. I had the oncotype dx test which came back with a score of 13. Day 3 today of DXT , tamoxifen not too bad for me but was already having a few hot flushes as peri menopausal (age 49)  Best of luck X
Posts.Title: No chemo and tamoxifen

Posts.Content: Hi Check out the TailorX study. Early results show lots of people with ER+ LN-ve tumours don't need chemo if oncotype dx test low risk. I know it sounds weird to have cancer and no chemo but studies show if early , small and good receptors then either mastectomy and hormones therapy or WLE and DXT and hormones are enough Nicki
Posts.Title: No chemo and tamoxifen
